cause.description:
Jake McAdams needs a new computer as the one he has now is over 15 years old and not very powerful. To keep up with his class at school Jake needs at least a semi decent laptop that ranges from $600-$1000. Minimum specs would be at least a dual core 1.8, 512mb ram, 80gb hdd, dvd-rom/cd-rw, wlan and nic built it.
1. Help Underpriveleged Child
cause.mission: Buy a new computer for an underprivliged youth.
cause.name: Project New Computer
